boardHeight.description: The height of the board for the Y component of a checker.

boardWidth.description: The width of the board for X component of a checker.

checkerLastJumped.description: If the last checker jumped, meaning it can move again.

checkerLastMoved.description: The checker that last moved and must be moved because only one checker can move during each players turn.

checkers.description: All the checkers currently in the game.

currentPlayer.description: The player whose turn it is currently. That player can send commands. Other players cannot.

currentPlayers.description: List of all the players who can send commands to the server.

currentTurn.description: The current turn number, starting at 0 for the first player's turn

gameObjects.description: A mapping of every game object's ID to the actual game object. Primarily used by the server and client to easily refer to the game objects via ID.

maxTurns.description: The maximum number of turns before the game will automatically end.

players.description: List of all the players in the game.

Game.description: The simple version of American Checkers. An 8x8 board with 12 checkers on each side that much move diagonally to the opposing side. Very simple.
Game.name: Checkers

kinged.description: If the checker has been kinged and can move backwards.

owner.description: The player that controls this Checker.

x.description: The x coordinate of the checker.

y.description: The y coordinate of the checker.

Checker.description: A checker on the game board.

arguments.description: The x coordinate to move to.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y coordinate to move to.
arguments.name: y

move.description: Moves the checker from its current location to the given (x, y).
